title: Rivers at work: an introduction to channel processes
brief_description: Introduces some of the basic concepts of fluvial geomorphology. Shows the processes which mould the landscape, indicates how field and laboratory observations provide insight into these processes, and gives a theoretical framework through which the study of rivers can be approached.
